archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.1.3b: b) giving high priority to reliability, compatibility (e.g. with other hardware/software used by the organisation) and capacity (e.g. network bandwidth) during the acquisition process
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
